title: Executive Order 5750-Revocation of Withdrawal of Lands for Lighthouse Purposes, California
content: It is hereby ordered that so much of Executive order of January 26, 1867, as withdrew a tract of land at Point Buchon, Calif., for lighthouse purposes, and Executive order of November 27, 1905, which withdrew lots 8 and 9, fractional sec. 36, township 29 south, range 10 east of the Mount Diablo meridian, California, for lighthouse purposes be, and are hereby, revoked.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5750-Revocation of Withdrawal of Lands for Lighthouse Purposes, California Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361317
